greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the first prime ending in exactly n 1's.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
program: (PARI) { b=0; f=1; for (n=1, 100, b=10*b + 1; f*=10; k=0; while (!isprime(b + k*f), if (k%10, k++, k+=2)); write("b065821.txt", n, " ", b + k*f) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Nov 01 2009
results.author: Jonathan Ayres (jonathan.ayres(AT)btinternet.com), Nov 23 2001
ext: Edited and extended by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 04 2003
